resources.string: Plants are living things that can be found in our environment./n Plants can manufacture their food by themselves making use of water and energy from sunlight through a process called photo they thesis. Plants take in carbon dioxide produced by animal and give off oxygen that is needed by man for survival Parts of a plant The main parts of a plant include the following:- Leaves,Stem,Root and Flower
